topic: Model Governance and Compliance on GCP
question_text: How would you establish a robust Model Governance and Compliance framework for Generative AI on GCP, ensuring data privacy, ethical AI, and regulatory adherence?
hook_text: Building Gen AI on GCP requires strong governance. Here's how to ensure compliance, privacy, and ethics in your models.
cta_text: Master Gen AI governance on GCP! Follow for more Cloud Architect insights.

answer_sections.title: Data Protection & Access Control
answer_sections.text: Sensitive data processed by Generative AI models. Cloud DLP de-identifies, redacts, tokenizes data. IAM defines fine-grained access policies. Ensure data sovereignty with proper controls. Secure Generative AI workflows.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Protect sensitive data in Generative AI. Cloud DLP de-identifies, IAM secures access. Implement strong data sovereignty controls.

answer_sections.title: Responsible Model Management
answer_sections.text: Vertex AI Model Registry tracks lineage. Integrate Responsible AI Toolkit for bias detection. Implement MLOps for secure deployments. Version control, auditability critical. Ensure ethical Gen AI development.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Manage models responsibly. Vertex AI tracks lineage. Responsible AI Toolkit detects bias. MLOps ensures secure, ethical deployments.

answer_sections.title: Continuous Compliance & Audit
answer_sections.text: Cloud Logging captures model interactions. Cloud Audit Logs tracks administrative activities. Security Command Center identifies misconfigurations. Real-time monitoring, alerts crucial. Maintain verifiable compliance posture.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Monitor Gen AI for compliance. Cloud Logging captures interactions, Audit Logs track activity. Security Command Center identifies risks.
